p: Hadi et al. [ 7] identified major alkaloids, hodgkinsines, and other compounds, including calycanthine, (+/−)-chimonanthine, meso-chimonanthine, 2-ethyl-6-methylpyrazine, and 3-methyl-1,2,3,4-tetrahydro-γ-carboline from the leaves of P. malayana. Matssura et al. [ 9] illustrated the analgesic activities of hodgkinsine, (+)-chimonanthine, and meso-chimonanthine. Hadi [ 8] found the anti-bacterial activities of LPM-574, which is a derivative of hodgkinsine. Chebib et al. [ 10] reported the anti-convulsant effect of calycanthine.
